Reviews.Title: Camera, Main Lenses & Tripod are fine, the rest is second rate at best
Reviews.Author: Macsandy
Reviews.Content: Card reader fell apart on first use, extra battery doesn't hold a charge as long as Nikon's brand. Case is a starter case - it will do the job, but it's so-so. The telephoto and wide angle/macro lenses are generic.

Reviews.Title: great camera bundle
Reviews.Author: HarryMtrains04
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife as a bday and anniversary gift as she is training to be a professional photographer and needed a professional grade camera. Thanks for the fast shipping

Reviews.Title: nice camera, nice price
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Nice camera set for a good price, accessories are pretty poor but I guess that's to be expected at this price

Reviews.Title: Nikon D5200
Reviews.Author: S. Knebel
Reviews.Content: This camera is more than I expected.  I have had it a month so I'm still trying out everything so far it has been fun.  The bundle package was like having Christmas in July.  So much stuff to play with.  And everything arrived packed well and on time.  Highly recommend the camera and the company who put together the bundle.

Reviews.Title: Good package
Reviews.Author: A. E. Scheel "Johnny Junkie"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a starter set to get into photography, it comes with a few things I don't use (macro lens, card wallet) but everything else that is included makes for a perfect set.

Reviews.Title: Headline
Reviews.Author: gypsyvalet
Reviews.Content: I've only had it for a couple of weeks, kind of hard to "love" it until I know t better,
